scripts.start:local: npm run build:ts && export ENV=local && cp -r environments/. dist/environments && node dist/index.js
scripts.copy:env:local: mkdir -p ./dist/environments && cpy environments/.local.env dist/. && cpy --rename docker-compose.yml docker-compose.local.yml ./dist/.
scripts.build:local: npm run build:ts && npm run copy:env:local && npm run copy:config
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:ts && export ENV=prod && cp -r environments/. dist/environments && node dist/index.js
scripts.copy:env:prod: mkdir -p ./dist/environments && cpy environments/.prod.env dist/. && cpy --rename docker-compose.yml docker-compose.prod.yml ./dist/.
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:ts && npm run copy:env:prod && npm run copy:config
